name: The Canada Maple- Hand-embroidered maple leaf felt pin...
description:
A gorgeous hint of leafy loveliness, hand-embroidered in beautiful rich tones, this maple leaf brooch is perfect to add a little autumnal air to your wardrobe. 

A rich deep red, with hot, bright orange laid between, and orange stitching the brooch is made entirely from layers of beautiful quality wool mix felt, and finished with a blanket stitch edge and a securely attached pin-back fastener. 
It would look fab on your coat, hat, or bag- wherever you please! Other styles of leaf also available too!

Leaf measures approximately 11cm wide at its widest point, and 10cm tall (4.5" x 4")

name: Old Oak- hand-embroidered oak leaf brooch in brown...
description:
A gorgeous hint of leafy loveliness, hand-embroidered in beautiful rich tones, this oak leaf brooch is perfect to add a little autumnal air to your wardrobe. 

A rich golden brown, laid on bitter chocolate backing and made entirely from layers of beautiful quality wool mix felt, the brooch is finished with a blanket stitch edge, with a securely attached pin-back fastener. 
It would look fab on your coat, hat, or bag- wherever you please! Other styles of leaf also available too!

Leaf measures approximately 11cm long and 5cm wide (4.5" x 2")

name: Little Green Leaf- hand-embroidered felt pin...
description:
A lush green lovely, to add a little leafy fabulousness to your wardrobe. 
Hand embroidered in three colours of quality wool mix felt, the brooch is finished with a blanket stitch edge, with a securely attached pin-back fastener. 
It would look fab on your coat, hat, or bag- wherever you please! Other styles of leaf also available too!

Leaf measures approximately 11cm long and 5cm wide (4.5" x 2")

name: Jaffa Orange Poppy- large corsage felt pin...
description:
I just love this fab juicy jaffa orange!
Beautiful felt applique brooch with hand embroidery and button embellishment. Would look great with black or denim, and can be worn on your jacket, bag, jeans- wherever you please!

Please contact me if you would like a colour in this brooch that you cannot see, if it is not here, I can always make one to your specification! 

Measurements: Flower- 7cm/ 3" wide. Total width- 11cm/4.5" wide.
Finished with a blanket stitch edge, button centre, and silver tone brooch pin.

name: Little bird- Hand embroidered felt birdie pin...
description:
A fabulous addition to your hat, coat or bag, this little birdie will set even the most sophisticated outfit off a tweet! (boom boom)

Hand-cut, hand sewn and hand-embroidered using high quality wool/ viscose blend felt, and finished with a brooch pin. 
It measures 9cm long and 4cm wide at its widest point (3.5" x 1.5". )
